snippet.title: Battleloot Adventure Teaser!
snippet.description:
Set in a parody fantasy world, Battleloot Adventure is an original mix of strategy and role- playing that will take players on a whimsical quest into the heart of Kameloot, a wealthy realm threatened by viciously grumpy monsters, ruthless mercenaries and last, but not least, vexing taxes! Its cartoon-style graphics and humorous storyline will charm all sorts of gamers, while the streamlined gameplay, fast-paced combat and painless touch controls will make for a truly addictive experience. 

For more information, please visit http://facebook.com/BattlelootAdventure or http://dtales.it/.
